text:
Crowded Streets, Dark Thoughts

A dense crowd of peasants surrounds him.  
Raskolnikov: "What are they shouting about?"  
Raskolnikov: "I want to join in."  
Peasant: "Mind your own business!"

---

A street filled with noise and chaos.  
Raskolnikov: "Why do I feel drawn here?"  
Raskolnikov: "Just wanderingâ€¦ thinking of nothing."  

---

Women gather outside festive establishments.  
Raskolnikov: "So much laughter, yet so lonely."  
Drunken soldier: "Where am I going?"

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov wanders through a lively district filled with peasants and women, feeling a mix of depression and curiosity.
